query:
UPDATE atividades a
SET projetoId = (
  SELECT p.id FROM projetos p WHERE p.codigo = 
    CASE 
      WHEN a.codigo IN ('AT001', 'AT002', 'AT003') THEN 'PROJ001'
      WHEN a.codigo IN ('AT004', 'AT005', 'AT006') THEN 'PROJ002'
      WHEN a.codigo IN ('AT007', 'AT008', 'AT009') THEN 'PROJ003'
      WHEN a.codigo IN ('AT010', 'AT011', 'AT012') THEN 'PROJ004'
      WHEN a.codigo IN ('AT013', 'AT014', 'AT015') THEN 'PROJ005'
      WHEN a.codigo IN ('AT016', 'AT017', 'AT018') THEN 'PROJ006'
      WHEN a.codigo IN ('AT019', 'AT020', 'AT021') THEN 'PROJ007'
      WHEN a.codigo IN ('AT022', 'AT023', 'AT024') THEN 'PROJ008'
      WHEN a.codigo IN ('AT025', 'AT026', 'AT027') THEN 'PROJ009'
      WHEN a.codigo IN ('AT028', 'AT029', 'AT030') THEN 'PROJ010'
    END
)
WHERE a.codigo LIKE 'AT%';
